100 
101  // Stream state bits
102  enum StreamStateBit
103  {
104  RO_BIT = 0, // Character array is immutable
105  WO_BIT = 1 // Character array cannot be read
106  };
107  typedef int StreamState;
108 
109  // Initialization
110  void initialize(container_type const & data, StreamState state);
111 
112  // Cleanup
113  void tidy();
114 
115  // Syncs the buffer, ensuring that all the data has been compressed/decompressed.
116  void sync() const;
117 
118  // Returns a stream state converted from an open mode
119  StreamState streamState(std::ios_base::openmode mode);
120 
121  // Make sure there is enough room in the container to hold this many bytes of additional output
122  void grow(size_t size);
123 
124  void flushInput();
125 
126  StreamState state_; // The stream state
127  mutable container_type data_; // Memory buffer holding the compressed/decompressed data
128  mutable z_stream stream_; // The zlib stream state
129  char_type putback_; // putback buffer
